title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Application by a Foreign Banking Corporation for a License to Establish a Branch or Agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Application by a Foreign Banking Corporation for a License to Establish a Branch or Agency

State Regulations
§ 101.1 - General information, version 5
§ 101.2 - Prior consultation, version 5
§ 101.3 - Information and documents requested, version 2
§ 101.4 - Conversion of license from agency to branch, or branch to agency, version 2
§ 101.5 - Additional branches and agencies, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 101

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 14[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
